Week of March 29
  Start seedlings in flats
    broccoli: 3 seeds at 1 in. spacing    
Week of April 19
  Prick out seedlings into flats
    broccoli: 2+ seedlings at 2 in. spacing in 6 in. deep flats
Week of May 3
  Harden off
    broccoli: 2 seedlings
Week of May 10
  Translpant
    broccoli: 2 seedlings
